name: Idli
description: Steamed rice cakes served with sambar and chutney.

name: Dosa
description: Crispy, thin crepe made from rice and lentil batter, usually served with sambar and chutney.

name: Masala Dosa
description: Crispy dosa filled with spiced mashed potatoes, served with sambar and chutney.

name: Vada
description: Deep-fried savory donut made from lentil batter, served with sambar and chutney.

name: Uttapam
description: Thick pancake topped with vegetables like tomatoes, onions, and chilies.

name: Pongal
description: Savory rice and lentil dish, flavored with black pepper, cumin, and ghee.

name: Upma
description: Savory porridge made from semolina, with vegetables and spices.

name: Pesarattu
description: Green gram dosa, a protein-rich crepe served with ginger chutney.

name: Rava Dosa
description: Crispy dosa made from semolina and rice flour, with spices and onions.

name: Bonda
description: Deep-fried snack with a potato filling, served with coconut chutney.

name: Appam
description: Soft, bowl-shaped pancakes made from fermented rice batter, served with coconut stew.

name: Neer Dosa
description: Thin, soft rice crepes served with coconut chutney or chicken curry.

name: Medu Vada
description: Crispy on the outside, fluffy on the inside, lentil-based donuts.

name: Kara Paniyaram
description: Savory dumplings made from a spiced batter of rice and lentils.

name: Idiappam
description: String hoppers made from rice flour, served with coconut milk or curry.

name: Poori with Masala
description: Deep-fried bread served with spiced potato masala.

name: Vegetable Semiya Upma
description: Upma made with vermicelli and mixed vegetables.

name: Rava Kesari
description: A sweet dish made from semolina, sugar, and ghee, often flavored with cardamom.
